title: Ex-Dividend Reminder: Northrop Grumman, Canadian National Railway and Albany International - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking at the universe of stocks we cover at Dividend Channel , on 9/6/19, Northrop Grumman Corp (Symbol: NOC), Canadian National Railway Co (Symbol: CNI), and Albany International Corp (Symbol: AIN) will all trade ex-dividend for their respective upcoming dividends. Northrop Grumman Corp will pay its quarterly dividend of $1.32 on 9/25/19, Canadian National Railway Co will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.5375 on 9/30/19, and Albany International Corp will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.18 on 10/7/19. As a percentage of NOC's recent stock price of $366.23, this dividend works out to approximately 0.36%, so look for shares of Northrop Grumman Corp to trade 0.36% lower - all else being equal - when NOC shares open for trading on 9/6/19. Similarly, investors should look for CNI to open 0.59% lower in price and for AIN to open 0.23% lower, all else being equal.
